name: OMSI Spline Configuration File
summary: Spline file created by OMSI The Bus Simulator, an omnibus driving simulation program; similar to other OMSI configuration files like .HUM , .SLI , .SCO , and .BUS files; holds configuration data that guides human and Artificial Intelligence (AI) traffic during gameplay, for e.g., the roads; can be customized.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: MR Software OMSI The Bus Simulator 2
